summary: WATER HAS LEAKED INSIDE THE PASSENGER COMPARTMENT SINCE PURCHASED.  THE DEALER HAS ATTEMPTED TO REPAIR THE PROBLEM FOR OVER A YEAR.  THE MANUFACTURERS LEGAL DEPARTMENT RECENTLY ADVISED THE CONSUMER THAT THEY WILL MAKE NO FURTHER REPAIR ATTEMPTS AND THAT THE LEAK IS DEEMED REASONABLE/ACCEPTABLE.    *NLM    *CB *JB
